feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2B][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 29, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Jan 6, 17:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2B region.

Start time : 29/01/2026 07:30 UTC
End time : 29/01/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2C][Managed vSphere] - Racks R711A07/R711A08 incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 8, 15:34 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Managed vSphere offering has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 08/01/2026 08:30 UTC
End time : 08/01/2026 08:55 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 8, 10:18 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 08/01/2026 08:55 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 08/01/2026 08:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Hosts in racks R711A07 and R711A08 were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R806L20/21 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 29, 02:10 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere on the specific racks R806L20/21 has been resolved.

Start time : 29/12/2025 01:45 UTC
End time : 29/12/2025 02:19 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts in racks R806L20/21 were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Rack R807L25 - R807L26 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 21, 13:08 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director has been resolved.

Start time : 21/12/2025 06:55 UTC
End time : 21/12/2025 09:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 21, 09:18 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Most of the hosts are now operational again.
Ongoing Actions : Our team is working on the remaining hosts.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 21, 07:05 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R807L25 and R807L26 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 21/12/2025 06:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
Dec 19, 19:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 16, 09:50 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 16, 09:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 19/12/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding
